author: Josh Marcus, Christina Sterbenz
title: ‘Essential’ Farm Workers Are Putting Food on Your Table With No Insurance, No Sick Pay, and Few Safety Regulations
description: “To work in the fields, maybe we are exposed, but we have to keep working.”
content:
